mapper.update: UPDATE showplan_maoyan SET cinema_id = #{cinemaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, movie_id = #{movieId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, show_date = #{showDate,jdbcType=DATE}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIME}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIME}, language = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hall = #{hall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, versionDesc = #{versiondesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salePrice = #{saleprice,jdbcType=REAL}, cinemaPrice = #{cinemaprice,jdbcType=REAL}, ticket_url = #{ticketUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT id, cinema_id, movie_id, show_date, start_time, end_time, language, hall, versionDesc, salePrice, cinemaPrice, ticket_url FROM showplan_maoyan WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
